sentence.Network_en: The variety of garnet includes almandine, pyrope, magnesium - iron garnet, manganese aluminum garnet, andradite and calcium - chromium garnet.
sentence.Network_cn: 石榴石的种类包括(铁铝榴石 、 镁铝榴石 、 镁铁榴石 、 锰铝榴石 、 钙铁榴石、钙铬榴石).

PerfectNetExp.abs: andesite 安山岩andradite 钙铁榴石anemobarometer 风速风压计
常见的石榴石为红色,常见的石榴石因其化学成分而确认为六种,分别为红榴石(Pyrope)、铁铝石榴子石(Almandine)、锰铝石榴石(Spessartite)、钙铁石榴石(Andradite)、.

list.abs: 黑榴辉岩 cromaltite黑榴正长岩 andradite syenite黑榴正长岩 sviatonossite(andradite sodasyenite).
black amber 黑琥珀black andradite garnet 黑色钙铁榴石black coral 黑珊瑚
沪江词库精选iron andradite是什么意思、英语短语。iron andradite的在线翻译: 铁榴石相关短语:  a man of iron n.意志坚强的人,严酷的人  an iron fist.
a green andradite used as a gemstone ., 一种用作宝石的绿色钙铁榴石.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: named after J. B. de Andrada e Silva (c. 1763–1838), Brazilian geologist, + -ite

means.word_mean: 1. a garnet consisting of calcium iron silicate and having any color ranging from yellow and green to brown and black; used as gemstone
